amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to prepare or publish final regulations regarding a commercial leasing program for oil shale resources on public lands or to conduct an oil shale lease sale.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (CO) amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 215 (Roll no. 574).

action.text: Mr. Cannon demanded a separate vote on the Udall (CO) amendment (A054).
